【Syfe Income+】Open account via MoneySmart can receive a HK$300 Apple Gift Card OR HK$300 PARKnSHOP E-Vouchers OR HK$300 HKTVMALL E-Vouchers!


Simply enter the code “MSSYFE23” after your successful sign up to be eligible to get HK$300 equivalent gift rewards from MoneySmart (first fund HK$35,000 or above into any Syfe portfolios) Also can enjoy extra HK$200/ HK$500/ HK$700 Syfe cash rewards (first fund HK$35,000 /HK$100,000/ HK$200,000 or above into any Syfe portfolios)


1. 【Syfe Income+】
・Earn up to 8.6% p.a. target monthly payout in HKD
・Get HK$200 when you first fund HK$25,000 into Income+
・Get HK$500 when you first fund HK$100,000 into Income+
・Get HK$700 when you first fund HK$200,000 into Income+


2. 【Syfe Cash Management Solution: Cash+】
・Earn yield of 5.41% p.a. on your idle cash
・Get HK$200 when you first fund HK$25,000 into Cash+
・Get HK$500 when you first fund HK$100,000 into Cash+
・Get HK$700 when you first fund HK$200,000 into Cash+


3. Other Syfe investment portfolios
・Get HK$200 when you first fund HK$35,000 into any investment portfolios
・Get HK$500 when you first fund HK$100,000 into any investment portfolios
